001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005/** A list of external module locator instances that are queried in order. */
006public record ExternalModuleLocators(List<ExternalModuleLocator> list) {
007  public static ExternalModuleLocators of(ExternalModuleLocator... locators) {
008    return new ExternalModuleLocators(List.of(locators));
009  }
010}
